title: TCP Load Balancer
description: A lightweight TCP load balancer prototype using epoll for handling client connections and forwarding requests to backend servers.

title: Lucien Bot
description: A music bot for Discord with voice channel support and custom commands for moderators and admins.

title: Spotify Widget
description: A web application that allows users to authenticate with Spotify, view their playlists, and access information about artists and genres based on their profile.

title: Real Time Chat Application
description: Web application allowing users to register for public chat rooms via WebSockets in Go and Typescript.
